tags: <- for the callie art. i redrew it for this so its technically new LOL
body:
@screentones-webcomicresources are hosting a #MeetTheWebcomic thing on bsky today and I figured I’d post my stuffs here too even if it’s not technically being hosted here ^_^

So here’s the banner ^ and here’s the little blurb v

The night before Callisto is scheduled to be executed, a pirate woman is tossed into her cell with her…
And all of a sudden she finds herself being swept off her feet (…and onto the back of a giant rooster?)

⭐ » HeartOfTheStorm.co.uk
⭐ » ko-fi.com/harrie

And here’s the little snippets I included with it!

Heart of the Storm

Chapter 1 will be concluding very soon, so it’s a great time to catch up :)

summary: The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was "draw your characters as realistically as you can," and I...
body:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!

reblog.tree_html:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!

summary: in your new art you posted of the tattoos, what is the font you used for the bulk of the text? i have a hard time finding comic...
question: in your new art you posted of the tattoos, what is the font you used for the bulk of the text? i have a hard time finding comic fonts because they make the G's look too much like 6's most of the time and i have a hard time reading them, but that one keeps them very clear. thanks if you can answer!
answer: It’s Spinner Rack Pro BB! The other font used for anyone curious is Longbow BB. Neither of these are free fonts I’m afraid, but Blambot does have several free fonts available. For a free alternative you might like Digital Strip 2 BB or Milk Mustache BB!

reblog.comment: It’s Spinner Rack Pro BB! The other font used for anyone curious is Longbow BB. Neither of these are free fonts I’m afraid, but Blambot does have several free fonts available. For a free alternative you might like Digital Strip 2 BB or Milk Mustache BB!

trail.content_raw: It’s Spinner Rack Pro BB! The other font used for anyone curious is Longbow BB. Neither of these are free fonts I’m afraid, but Blambot does have several free fonts available. For a free alternative you might like Digital Strip 2 BB or Milk Mustache BB!
trail.content: It’s Spinner Rack Pro BB! The other font used for anyone curious is Longbow BB. Neither of these are free fonts I’m afraid, but Blambot does have several free fonts available. For a free alternative you might like Digital Strip 2 BB or Milk Mustache BB!
